Reviews.Title: 480TVL Outdoor CCD Bullet Infrared Day and Night Cam - Very Clear View
Reviews.Author: Eneida Padilla
Reviews.Content: 480TVL Outdoor CCD Bullet Infrared Day and Night Cam - Very Clear View in the day and at night, we purchased these before and decided to buy the same ones simply because we were very happy with the clearity of the view in day and night. We used outdoors for years and still very clear and very strong and durable. Great little cams.

Reviews.Title: One of Three has black lines scrolling
Reviews.Author: Brian R. Moga "Zippy12"
Reviews.Content: I have had these in operation for almost 2 years.  I have the hooked to a motion sensing 4 channel DVR.  Tow of the cams are working great and sending me feeds when motion is detected.  One of the cameras has black lines the scroll up which trigger the motion and I get false positives.This also has the Sony HAD sensor and I am ok with the picture, but expected better. no biggie for the price I paid.So one of 3 failed in 2 years - I would still buy more, but the 720 line cameras have hit the market...

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3 CCD Vandal Indoor Outdoor 480TVL High Resolution Color Camera Day / Night Vision, with Sony Super HAD CCD Image Sensor
Wall mount and Celling mount
30 infra-red LEDs see in the dark up to 60-80ft
This product is CIB Security Exclusive with CIB brand name
One Year Warranty Guaranteed in USA Security Store
